name: Holnap Ifjúsági Alapítvány a Fenntarthatóságért
membership: European Partners for the Environment, Sustainable Development Solutions Network Youth, United Nations Major Group for Children and Youth, Great Silk Way Youth
memberOrga: We do not have member organisations, but have local chapters in all V4 countries that are in charge of community management. Those participating in our work join as contracted volunteers of the foundation.
goal:
V4SDG - Visegrad for Sustainability is a non-profit youth-led organisation strengthening partnership for the UN Sustainable Development Goals in the countries of the Visegrad Group (Czech Republic, Hungary, Poland, Slovakia).

Our scope ranges from local impact-action, regional lobbying, to global representation. Advocacy, network-building and pro-bono sustainability consulting are the three main pillars of activities.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Budget, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: Climate Neutrality by 2050, EU Sustainable Development Strategy, Erasmus+, Energy Union and Climate, Gender Equality Strategy, Citizens’ Participation, Sustainable Finance, ensuring the Commission’s commitment to SDG implementation through the European Partners for the Environment
